quote: General Paving and Contracting, Inc. regularly use Priority Construction Corp. on a range of construction projects. Priority’s crews are punctual and highly skilled in a variety of concrete jobs. Over the years, they have proven to be easy to work with and have consistently performed excellent work.
author: Robert L. Quinn, Jr.
title: General Paving & Contracting, Inc., Halethorpe, Maryland
